title: 'SUPERB DEVICE FOR AUDIO SOUND'
body: The Mivi Play Bluetooth Speaker is a wireless speaker designed for portable audio playback. Here are some key features and considerations for this speaker:  1. **Bluetooth Connectivity**: The Mivi Play speaker uses Bluetooth technology to connect wirelessly to compatible devices such as smartphones, tablets, and laptops. This allows you to stream music, podcasts, and audio from your device to the speaker without the need for cables.  2. **Playtime**: With a claimed playtime of 12 hours, the Mivi Play offers extended battery life, making it suitable for all-day outdoor activities, picnics, or listening sessions without frequent recharging.  3. **Sound Quality**: Sound quality is a critical factor for speakers. While the specific sound quality can vary depending on the model, Mivi speakers are generally known for providing clear and balanced audio, including decent bass performance for their size.  4. **Made in India**: As mentioned, the Mivi Play is proudly made in India. Supporting locally manufactured products can be appealing to those who prefer products with domestic origins.  5. **Portable Design**: The speaker's compact and portable design makes it easy to carry with you on the go. It's suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.  6. **Built-in Microphone**: Some Bluetooth speakers, including the Mivi Play, come with a built-in microphone, allowing you to use the speaker as a hands-free speakerphone for phone calls.  7. **Water Resistance**: Check if the speaker has any level of water resistance or IP rating. This can be important if you plan to use it near water or in outdoor settings where it might be exposed to moisture.  8. **Controls**: The speaker typically has onboard controls for adjusting volume, skipping tracks, and pairing with devices. Some models also support voice assistant integration.  9. **Compatibility**: Ensure that the speaker is compatible with your devices, including smartphones, tablets, and laptops, and that it supports the Bluetooth version of your devices.  10. **Price**: Compare the pricing of the Mivi Play Bluetooth Speaker with similar models from other brands to make sure it fits your budget.  11. **Warranty and Customer Support**: Check the warranty and customer support options provided by Mivi to ensure you have adequate support in case of any issues with the speaker.  When choosing a Bluetooth speaker, it's essential to consider your usage scenarios, audio quality preferences, and specific features you may need. Reading user reviews and listening to audio samples, when available, can also help you assess whether the Mivi Play meets your expectations for sound quality and functionality.

title: 'Do something about the battery & built'
body: 'I use it as my pc speaker but yeah i have been buying products from Mivi for last 3 years but the built quality is not that amazing & product perform is not satisfactory.
